title: (x) Big and bold serif on E4 website - custom face by Fontsmith {Erik S}
content:
Hi all,

Just wondering what this font is in the main flash banner on the site (not the pop up), it has the text - STOP.... treating me like a kid, on the first ad:

[http://www.channel4.com/entertainment/tv/microsites/E/e4/index.html?hpos=E4](http://web.archive.org/web/20120927043353/http:/www.channel4.com/entertainment/tv/microsites/E/e4/index.html?hpos=E4 "http://www.channel4.com/entertainment/tv/microsites/E/e4/index.html?hpos=E4")

author: reboot

comments.content:
Check out Jason's site:

[http://www.fontsmith.co.uk/custom.php?id=489](http://web.archive.org/web/20120927043353/http:/www.fontsmith.co.uk/custom.php?id=489 "http://www.fontsmith.co.uk/custom.php?id=489")

It's the custom face for Channel 4 in the UK.

Does anyone know if there are any similar fonts for sales, I like the way it is big and bold, yet a serif.

Thanks.

It has a nice heavey weight as you've showng, but it isn't a serif, however it has serif-like tendencies in some of the details: [Costa PTF](http://web.archive.org/web/20120927043353/http:/www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/view/CostaPTF)
Thanks for that Miss Tiffany, check out those ligs too.

No problem.

Yes, JF is crazy for ligatures. :^)
